title: "Supermicro expands GPU system portfolio"
excerpt: "Supermicro has unveiled new systems that are based on NVIDIA Ampere architecture GPUs and 3rd Gen Intel Xeon Scalable processors with built-in AI accelerators (Supermicro X12 series). The servers are designed for AI applications where low latency and high application performance are key requirements."
